description:
Package Tracking is an application that can track packages (using your HP Touchpad) shipped through the following 44 carriers:

UPS
FedEx
U.S. Postal Service
A1 International
Aramex
Australia Post
Canada Post
CEVA
China Post
City Link
DHL
DHL Germany
DHL Global Mail
DHL UK Domestic
DHL Poland
DPD
Dynamex
EMS
Ensenda
FedEx SmartPost
Golden State Overnight
Home Delivery Network
Hongkong Post
India Post
Inpost
Japan Post
Lasership
Mail Express
OnTrac
OSM Worldwide
Parcelforce
Post Danmark
Posten Norway
Posten Sweden
Prestige Delivery
Purolator
RoyalMail
Spee-Dee Delivery
Streamlite
Thailand Post
TNT
Toll
UPS Mail Innovations
YRC

Define your tracking numbers using Add / Edit packages tab, click on your package description on the left and after a few seconds you will get information about the current status of your shipment. 

If you want you can also see your package route - to see it touch the Show button on map. (Map currently supported for UPS, USPS, FEDEX & DHL packages (only USA)).

You can also print you tracking history using print button.
versionNote:
Fixed problem with deleting packages.

Added delete button.

Package update time is now displayed in user local time.

Fixed problem with displaying only first status.
